channel.title: VLC or Parole media player
channel.description:
Now in xfce-buster version they replaced VLC with Parole , so now which one should we go with ? Parol xfce default player or Whonix VLC default player?
Usability,Security,Compatibility,Size ... all concerned.
https://docs.xfce.org/apps/parole/start

item.title: VLC or Parole media player
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
VLC all the way. No DE bundled mediaplayer can compare to the features and format support of VLC.

Read full topic
